properties.name: openapi.t-oP.base-path
properties.description: Base path this application ins running on.

properties.name: spring.max-batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entities that can be uploaded in a batch. Defaults to 100.

properties.name: spring.security.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Allowed origins for cross-origin resource sharing (CORS).

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.enabled
properties.description: Whether authentication via OAuth2 is enabled. Defaults to false.

properties.name: spring.paging.page-size
properties.description: Page size to be used when serving paged responses.

properties.name: management.health.elasticsearch.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable elasticsearch health check.

properties.name: coding.terminology-service
properties.description: URL of the terminology service. Defaults to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/api.

properties.name: coding.suggestions-page-size
properties.description: Page size of code suggestions.

properties.name: coding.code-children-page-size
properties.description: Page size of code children.

properties.name: top.appName
properties.description: Name of this application.

properties.name: top.version
properties.description: Version of this application.

properties.name: top.demo-data
properties.description: Whether the database should be initialised with demo data. Defaults to false.

properties.name: top.result.dir
properties.description: Directory where query results are stored.

properties.name: top.result.download-enabled
properties.description: Whether the download of query results is enabled.

properties.name: top.phenotyping.data-source-config-dir
properties.description: Directory where data source configurations for phenotype adapters are search for.

properties.name: top.phenotyping.execute-queries
properties.description: Whether phenotype queries are executed or not.

properties.name: top.documents.data-source-config-dir
properties.description: Directory where data source configurations for document adapters are search for.

properties.name: top.documents.default-adapter
properties.description: Default document adapter to use for document queries.

properties.name: top.documents.concept-graphs-api.uri
properties.description: URL of the concept graphs service.

properties.name: top.documents.security.graphdb.username
properties.description: Username for authentication to the graph DB.

properties.name: top.documents.security.graphdb.password
properties.description: Password for authentication to the graph DB.

properties.name: top.documents.security.documentdb.username
properties.description: Username for authentication to the document DB.

properties.name: top.documents.security.documentdb.password
properties.description: Password for authentication to the document DB.

properties.name: top.documents.max-term-count
properties.description: Maximum number of terms that can be included in a document query.
